name: unaccredited
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not officially recognized or approved: She holds a degree from an unaccredited university. They will not allow unaccredited foreign journalists to enter the country. Opposite
accredited
More examplesFewer examplesThe college is unaccredited, so the qualifications it gives are not worth very much.The lawyers objected because the work had been carried out at an unaccredited laboratory.She graduated with an unaccredited diploma.He had bought both his undergraduate and graduate degrees from an unaccredited online university.Many of the exotic animals end up in unaccredited zoos.
